oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from consolidation interview with Bob Horton, November 30, 1994
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an interview with Bob Horton, conducted on November 30, 1994 by Carole Bucy as part of the Metro Consolidation Oral History Interviews. Horton discusses his role in the consolidation of the city and county governments. He also comments briefly on other individuals and their contributions. The record is of poor quality and is difficult to understand. The complete record of the interview is available at the Metro Government Archives.
